description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zombified Avatars are on the loose, and they're hungry – for fun! Defeat wave after wave of quirky zombies in this light-hearted wave defense game. Blast away 5 types of enemies using an upgradeable arsenal. Slow down time. Unlock over 50 Awards. Share your high scores and challenge your friends. Will you triumph over all 20 waves? (Hint: Probably not!)
